text:
Hey everyone, i’m looking to create a mega menu
I’m more than competent building it
I just need a user friendly way of adding icons next to the links, advanced menus obviosuly doesn’t allow anything other than links

HubSpot has no native way to add icons in advanced menu’s or simple menus, and I can’t just create a custom module because i’d need one more repeater group than I’m allowed, does anyone have any suggestions?

Structure:
```Primary link 1
	Start megamenu
	Secondary group Title 1
		Icon 1 - Link 1
		Icon 2 - Link 2
		Icon 3 - Link 3
	Secondary group Title 2
		Icon 4 - Link 1
		Icon 5 - Link 2
	End megamenu
Primary Link 2
	Start megamenu
	Secondary group Title 1
		Icon 6 - Link 1
		Icon 7 - Link 2
		Icon 8 - Link 3
	Secondary group Title 2
		Icon 9 - Link 1
		Icon 10 - Link 2
	End megamenu
etc..```
I guess I could use links to the icon files in a menu and then manipulate it to add images if the link goes to the file manager, but it’s not really user friendly
Adding the FontAwesome code into the Advanced Menu items works for me
Good idea but I need custom Icons, and also still wouldn’t say telling the client to add code into the menu is user friendly

I’ve decided to do a module like this, It’s annoying that you can’t nest more than 3 times so I can have a repeater for the secondary groups but the max will be 3 and I can use conditional logic to hide them
I think further nesting capability is something in the works at HubSpot but not for sure.
I don’t always need it and I do find HubSpot’s fields easy to use but it does make me miss WP ACF repeaters, where you can nest to your hearts content + so many other cool features
